Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor's Initial Cases
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and his initial engagements, starting with an underwater mystery and transitioning to a city-based chase involving cop shooters and a yacht espionage plot.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Enigma
sub_scenes.description: The story begins with an underwater scene involving divers and the introduction of the Human Meteor, hinting at an impending conflict and an undersea terror.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Duke, the taxi driver, gets involved with wealthy playboys and a suspicious G-Man's car, leading to a chase and the Human Meteor's intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution of Cop Shooters and Yacht Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor deals with the cop shooters, gets hospitalized, and uncovers a yacht espionage plot, setting up a new mission.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration and Submarine Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Duke and Toby plan to infiltrate the suspicious yacht. Toby successfully boards, gets discovered, and uncovers a deeper submarine plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Toby Infiltrates the Yacht and is Spotted

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Underwater Battle
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor responds to Toby's report, confronts divers near the submarine, and engages in underwater combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Human Meteor Responds to the Call
Divers Identify and Target Human Meteor
Human Meteor Responds to Divers' Aggression
Diver's Threat and Human Meteor's Retaliation Hint
Spear Gun Attack and Cry for Help
Human Meteor's Torpedo Attack on Submarine

sub_scenes.title: Ship Attack and Yacht Investigation
sub_scenes.description: The action shifts to the surface where the ship crew reacts to the underwater explosion and Human Meteor attacks the ship and then pursues the yacht.

narrative_arcs.title: Human Meteor's Finishing Blow to Ship

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Domestic Interlude
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor investigates the yacht, finds Peter dead, searches for the depth map, and then the scene shifts to a domestic setting with Duke and Toby.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter's Death on Yacht
Human Meteor Searches for Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Evening Car Ride and Domestic Scene with Toby and Duke

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and the Ambulance Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc diverges to focus on the Liberty Lads confronting Nazis and a separate incident involving an ambulance and two curious boys.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazis
sub_scenes.description: The Liberty Lads engage in an armed confrontation with Nazis, preventing their destructive plans against America.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Wallet Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Two boys, Skip and Chuck, observe an ambulance arriving at a house and then find a dropped wallet, sparking their curiosity and investigation.

sub_scenes.title: Garage Intrigue and Major Bronson Reveal
sub_scenes.description: The boys' investigation leads them to a garage where they witness a Marine saluting a civilian who is revealed to be Major Bronson.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine Salutes Civilian - Major Bronson Revealed

sub_scenes.title: Garage Interception and Mr. Horst Encounter
sub_scenes.description: The boys are intercepted at the garage and taken to Mr. Horst, a menacing figure, escalating the suspense.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Garage and Interception

sub_scenes.title: Mr. Horst's Interrogation and Carbon Monoxide Plot
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys about the wallet while his associates discuss a sinister plot involving carbon monoxide.

narrative_arcs.title: Confirmation and Agreement on Carbon Monoxide Plan

sub_scenes.title: Garage Fight and Major Bronson's Threat
sub_scenes.description: Chaos erupts in the garage as fighting breaks out, the boys are overpowered, and Major Bronson directly threatens them.

sub_scenes.title: Lawyer's Betrayal and Horst's Men Turn Tide
sub_scenes.description: Major Bronson's lawyer unexpectedly turns violent, leading Horst's men to turn against Bronson, shifting the power dynamics.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Marine Help and Secret Office Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Skip and Chuck decide to seek help from Marines. Chuck encounters a Sergeant, while Skip discovers a secret office.

narrative_arcs.title: Plan to Seek Help and Sergeant Encounter

sub_scenes.title: Sabotage Plans and Conspiracy Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Chuck uncovers sabotage plans, and a conversation reveals a transcontinental organization using drivers as saboteurs.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks Crash and Skip's Defense
sub_scenes.description: Urgent news of Major Bronson reaches the Marine Barracks, a car crashes into the building, and Skip defends himself with books.

narrative_arcs.title: Urgent News and Car Crash at Barracks

sub_scenes.title: Bronson's Confrontation and Marine Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Major Bronson is confronted and accused, but the Marines arrive to rescue him and apprehend the attackers.

narrative_arcs.title: Immediate Aid and Call for Ambulance

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ in South America: Rosita's Kidnapping
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' and Henry in South America, caught in intrigue and involved in the kidnapping of President's daughter, Rosita, by Axis-linked bandits.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ and Military Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: The Champ and Henry are introduced in a South American town and are immediately placed under suspicion by the local military due to rumors of Axis bandits and Rosita's kidnapping.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting

sub_scenes.title: Kidnapping of The Champ and Henry by El Tigre's Men
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre's plan is revealed, and The Champ and Henry are carjacked by El Tigre's men, mistaken as rescuers by Rosita's family.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Demands and Forced Carjacking
The Forced Drive and Destination Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Misunderstanding and Planning at Tamale Street
sub_scenes.description: Mama pleads for help believing the kidnapped Americans are rescuers, while elsewhere, plans are being made at Tamale Street.

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Confrontation at El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: An infiltration of El Tigre's hideout is underway, leading to a confrontation with El Tigre himself.

sub_scenes.title: Search for Rosita and Identity Theft Revelation
sub_scenes.description: A search for Rosita's location intensifies, and a new character emerges revealing identity theft by Axis agents.

narrative_arcs.title: Claim of Identity Theft by Axis Agents

sub_scenes.title: Threats Against and Defense of El Tigre
sub_scenes.description: Internal conflict arises as some threaten El Tigre, while others defend him, leading to news about Rosita's whereabouts.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Mission and Rosita's Recovery
sub_scenes.description: A rescue mission is launched for Rosita, leading to combat and her eventual rescue and recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Rosita Held by Axis Agents, Rescue Plan
Escape to Citadel and Hotel Strategy

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, where he disobeys orders, possesses sub plans, and engages in sabotage and combat.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Fight and Disobedience Report
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan is fighting in the jungle while back on the ship, his disobedience and possession of sub plans are reported to Captain Lawton.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Reaction and Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: Captain Lawton reacts angrily to the report, but another officer tries to reassure him about Dolan's abilities and intentions.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Mission and Native Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Two men arrive in the jungle on a mission to find the captain's son, while another man's journey through the jungle leads to a native ambush.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle River Journey and Perceived Danger

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Capture and Torture for Sub Plans
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured and interrogated by Grauer's men, who demand the sub detector plans and resort to torture.

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Sabotage and Native Hut Burning
sub_scenes.description: Dolan continues his sabotage by setting fires, justified by his orders, while Grauer plans to eliminate the natives.

narrative_arcs.title: Marines' Onslaught and Grauer's Strategic Talk
Grauer's Dismissal and Native Hut Burning

sub_scenes.title: Dolan in Native Camp and Chief's Accidental Death
sub_scenes.description: Dolan enters a native camp, fights the natives, and the chief accidentally dies, leading to native submission.

sub_scenes.title: Ship Surrender and Father-Son Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Orders to surrender the ship are discussed, leading to a confrontation between the captain and his son, Dolan, and a ship deck fistfight.

sub_scenes.title: Order Rescinded and Disciplinary Action
sub_scenes.description: The surrender order is rescinded, Dolan is praised, and a disciplinary action is shown, concluding the immediate shipboard conflict.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins, Diane and Dan, as they investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them to a complex case involving racketeering, blood transfusions, and community action.

sub_scenes.title: Story Introduction and Newsroom Briefing
sub_scenes.description: The Twinkle Twins story is introduced, and they receive their assignment in the Weston newspaper office to investigate the Robert Burgess murder.

sub_scenes.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Visit
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane inquire at the police station and then visit the hospital to find Miss Reilly, uncovering a blood transfusion complication.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Racketeering Suspicions and Farnacci Link
sub_scenes.description: The twins suspect racketeering and connect Farnacci to the crime, leading them to investigate further.

sub_scenes.title: Search for Reilly and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The twins search for Tom Reilly and encounter Mrs. Murphy, who reveals crucial information about Farnacci's role and danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly and Initial Encounter
Conversation with Mrs. Murphy about Farnacci

sub_scenes.title: Chase and Blockade in Irish Neighborhood
sub_scenes.description: The twins pursue Tom Reilly, leading to a chase and a human blockade in the Irish neighborhood.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Chase of Tom Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Mob Justice, Police Intervention, and Hospital Rush
sub_scenes.description: Vigilante action arises, followed by mob justice, police intervention, and a rush to the hospital for the injured.

narrative_arcs.title: Rushed to Ambulance and Onward Concern

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Wait, Blood Transfusion, and Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Anxious wait at the hospital for news, blood transfusion efforts, and Tom Reilly's eventual recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Wait and Blood Transfusion News
Community Rushes to Donate and Hospital Anxiety
Blood Type Confirmation, Transfusion Preparation, and Recovery

sub_scenes.title: Justice for Lassie Reilly and Birthday Celebration
sub_scenes.description: Demand for justice for Lassie Reilly leads to police action, poolroom raid, and a final celebratory birthday party for Lassie.

narrative_arcs.title: Threats and Determination to Capture Farnacci
Police Respond and Arrest the Murderer
